words.prompt: If two things are ____________ the same size, they are nearly or about the same size.
Something ____________ relates to outer space or astronomy.
When you make a ____________, you do math to find an answer.
____________ are rules for judging something or making a decision.
You can measure across the center of a circle to find its ____________.
When you ____________ something, you examine it again and again.
To ____________ something is to move in a circle around it again and again.
____________ are anything that is shaped like a ball or a globe.
When you ____________ something, you take it for granted, or suppose it is so.
To ____________ is to make sure of something.
If you ____________ someone, you suggest or propose that the person be chosen, such as a candidate for an office.
If something is done ____________, it is easily seen or understood.
To ____________ is to trust or depend on someone or something.
When you are ____________, you provide approval, aid, or encouragement to others.
If you feel ____________ toward someone, you feel and understand their troubles.
A ____________ is a person who lacks physical strength.
Something that is ____________ has to do with farms or farming.
If something ____________, it grew weaker or smaller in number.
A ____________ is a sickness or an ailment.
If you can ____________ something, you can tell exactly what it is.
Something that is ____________ is likely to happen or be true.
If crops ____________, they are successful and strong.
Something ____________ is not planned for or predicted.
If something is ____________, it is happening over a large area or affecting many people.
